#summary What you need to use these tools.

= Prerequistes =

The GMFTools are based on the following frameworks

 * Eclipse Ganymede 3.4 http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/
 * GMF 2.1.0 http://www.eclipse.org/modeling/gmf/
 * openArchitectureWare 4.3 http://wiki.eclipse.org/OAW

You can download a large bundle containing all of these in the download section of
http://oaw.itemis.de/
